entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Precompiled queries: take into account the NRT status of parameters introduced in query filters #33509
    Backlog
  • Precompiled queries: calculate the NRT status of complex expressions in the funcletizer #33508
    Backlog
  • dotnet ef scaffold with MySql.EntityFramworkCore provider doesn't generate .HasDefaultValue(0) #33506
  • Basic support for creating entities on partitioned tables in SQL Server (Code-First) #33505
    Backlog
  • Query generated when filtering against a nullable owned type property isn't correct #33504

Closed

  • does Entity Framework Core tools reference - .NET Core CLI support managed identity? #33464
  • Perf problem on existence checks caused by SqlClient's connection resiliency feature #7283
    5.0.0
  • Distributed transactions failures when running EF Core tests on main #29054
    9.0.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Pregenerate SQL for precompiled queries #33510

Merged

  • Remove CodeQL trigger for 2.1 #33502
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33503
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #33500
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #33501
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #33499
